sourceMeaningMnemonic: Take your <radical>yakuza</radical> <radical>knife</radical> and put it in a <kanji>row</kanji> with the others.
meaningInfo: You have a yakuza knife. There are a bunch there, all in a row, so you follow suit by putting yours in the row too.
readingMnemonic: Should we put them in a <kanji>row</kanji>? <reading>Let's</reading> (<ja>れつ</ja>) put them in a row!
readingInfo: Imagine a bunch of yakuza being enthusiastic about putting their knives in a row. They all say together "Ret's do it!"
